General comment for Zip file

member.summary: Method to create a new zip storage in a stream

File access mode as used in FileStream constructor

member.summary: Method to open an existing storage from stream
member.param: Already opened stream with zip contents
File access mode for stream operations

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.AddFile(System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.Compression,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add full contents of a file into the Zip storage
member.param: Compression method
Full path of file to add to Zip storage
Filename and path as desired in Zip directory
Comment for stored file

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.AddStream(System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.Compression,System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Add full contents of a stream into the Zip storage
member.param: Compression method
Filename and path as desired in Zip directory
Stream object containing the data to store in Zip
Modification time of the data to store
Comment for stored file

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.Close
member.summary: Updates central directory (if pertinent) and close the Zip storage
member.remarks: This is a required step, unless automatic dispose is used

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ReadCentralDir
member.summary: Read all the file records in the central directory
member.returns: List of all entries in directory

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ExtractFile(System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ZipFileEntry,System.String)
member.summary: Copy the contents of a stored file into a physical file
member.param: Entry information of file to extract
Name of file to store uncompressed data
member.returns: True if success, false if not.
member.remarks: Unique compression methods are Store and Deflate

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ExtractFile(System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ZipFileEntry,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Copy the contents of a stored file into an opened stream
member.param: Entry information of file to extract
Stream to store the uncompressed data
member.returns: True if success, false if not.
member.remarks: Unique compression methods are Store and Deflate

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.RemoveEntries(System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.ZipFileEntry})
member.summary: Removes one of many files in storage. It creates a new Zip file.
member.param: Reference to the current Zip object
List of Entries to remove from storage
member.returns: True if success, false if not
member.remarks: This method only works for storage of type FileStream

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.ZipStorer.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the Zip file stream
